history.proof: intros xs a Hsorted Hinh. split. - intros a' Hin. sfirstorder depth: 3. - apply Hsorted.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros xs a Hsorted Hinh. split. - intros a' Hin. apply List.in_inv in Hin as [Heq | Hin]. + subst. split; [lia | lia]. + apply Hinh in Hin as [Hlt Hle]. split; [lia | lia]. - apply Hsorted.
